content: Having an edge means that a person has a certain quality that sets them apart from others. It could be a certain attractiveness, intelligence, or confidence that they possess. In the context of relationships, it might refer to a woman who is independent and strong-willed, or who has a unique and interesting personality. Essentially, having an edge means that a person stands out in some way, and that they are not afraid to be themselves. Does that help clarify things?
